column1: Table 2a. Côte d’Ivoire: Fiscal Operations of the Central Government, 2017–25
(Billions of CFA Francs; unless otherwise indicated)
Prog.         Est.      Prog.        Proj.            Proj.                Projections
Sources: Ivoirien authorities; and IMF staff estimates and projections.
Compared to the program column, this column reflects the rebased national accounts and a pre-crisis downward revision to tax revenue.
In 2017, includes one-off payments to soldiers of about FCFA 101 billion. In 2020, includes measures to address the COVID19 pandemic.
In the CFA franc zone, Fund resources are channeled via the regional central bank that provides equivalent domestic currency credit to the relevant government.
